statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 16 \\ 8 \\ 16 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -42 \\ -56 \\ -28 \\ -56 \\ 42 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
